files.description: Defines the authoritative JSON Schema requiring verbatim claim text, context (speaker/date/link), and a provenance anchor with strict required-field rules.
Implements typed dataclasses/Pydantic-style models for claim cards and provenance metadata aligned to the schema for consistent parsing and validation.
Provides full validation logic (schema + custom rules) and explicit abstention criteria when required fields are missing or non-verbatim/unsupported.
CLI script to scan output claim cards (.md/.json), enforce the updated intake checklist requirements, and fail/abstain with actionable error reporting.
Parses CLAIM_CARD_TEMPLATE.md-style markdown into structured objects, extracting verbatim claim, context fields, and provenance anchors reliably.
Updates the claim card template to mandate verbatim claim text plus context (speaker/date/link) and a provenance anchor field with clear instructions.
Documents the updated intake checklist requirements and abstention/validation rules for missing verbatim/context/provenance fields.
End-to-end unit tests covering valid cards, missing required fields, non-verbatim claims, missing context, and provenance anchor abstention behavior.
Provides a minimal valid claim card fixture including verbatim claim, full context (speaker/date/link), and provenance anchor for validation tests.
Provides an invalid claim card fixture missing required verbatim/context/provenance fields to verify abstention and error reporting.

missionDescription: Update the intake checklist to require exact claim text (verbatim) + context (speaker/date/link) + provenance anchor, and add validation rules/abstention criteria when any required field is missing.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Identifies the primary blocker that caused pilot work to stall (missing verbatim claim text), enabling a hard gate in the intake checklist so agents cannot begin without required fields....
